src.windows_registry module

class src.windows_registry.WindowsRegistry

Bases: object

get_oracle_conn_dict(conn_str_key_endpoint: str) → dict[str, str]

Retrieves and parses the Oracle DB connection string into a dictionary.

Parameters:

conn_str_key_endpoint (str) – The final part of the key for the Oracle DB connection string.

Returns:

A dictionary containing Oracle DB credentials parsed from the connection string.

Return type:

dict

get_oracle_conn_str(conn_str_key_endpoint: str) → str

Retrieves the Oracle DB connection string from the Windows Registry.

Parameters:

conn_str_key_endpoint (str) – The final part of the key for the Oracle DB connection string.

Returns:

The Oracle DB connection string.

Return type:

str

get_oracle_conn_str_paths()

Returns a dictionary of Oracle connection string paths on the local machine.

One complete path is constructed as: path_dict[‘base_path’] + path_dict[‘endpoints’][index of chosen endpoint].

Returns:

A dictionary containing base path and list of endpoints.

Return type:

dict

parse_oracle_conn_str(oracle_conn_str: str) → dict[str, str]

Parses an Oracle DB connection string into its components.

Parameters:

oracle_conn_str (str) – An Oracle DB connection string in the form user/password@service_name.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the parsed Oracle DB credentials.

Return type:

dict
